fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Fire a tear at someone, attacking them.
- (Familiar) Give the lead a Holy Mantle, raising their Defense Tier by 1 for that night and making them survive if they are lynched the next day. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attibutes:
fields.value:
- Has Powerful Defense if the lead.
- Lose your intrinsic Powerful Defense permanently after being attacked.
Damage: 1 (Basic)
Range: 5
Luck: 0%
